full_summary:
**Electrical Hardware and Supplies – Power Cables**
================================================

### Request for Proposal

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01010521
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: W3330-23-188
* **Publication Date**: October 19, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 3, 2022 @ 2:00 PM (ET)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K2
* **Contact Person**: David Hyppolite
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Email: <david.hyppolite@forces.gc.ca>
	+ Phone: 613-371-2408

### Tender Brief

This request for proposal is open only to Electrical and Electronic Products Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Stream one (1) for services in the National Capital Region. The successful bidder will provide Department of National Defence (DND) with power cables, as per the following category:

* Stream one (1) – Electrical Products

The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Anixter Canada Inc
* Graybar Canada
* Nedco, division of Rexel Canada Electrical Inc
* Daltco
* Wesco
* Gimpel
* Dubo
* Guillevin International Co
* Lumen
* Marchand
* KGPCo
* Newark Element 14
* Westburne-Rexel
* ECS Electrical
* Deschenes et Fils
* KVA Protection
* Robertson Electric
* Allied Electronics Canada

### Proposal Submission

Bidders are advised that the documents will be sent directly to the qualified Supply Arrangement Holders by the Contracting Authority. All submission shall be made in either official language of Canada.

### Important Notes

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* The distribution of the solicitation documents does not come from Buyandsell.gc.ca.

### Quoting Period

The quoting period for this tender is strictly from October 19, 2022 to November 3, 2022 at 2:00 PM
